exercises.cue: Hinge; exhale to stand; squeeze 1s at top.
Soft knees; long spine; pause 1s mid-shin.
Tuck chin; exhale; hold 2s at top.
Exhale press; shoulder blades back & down.
Ribs down; lats stretch; exhale pull.

Torso tall; knee tracks toes; exhale up.
